headline: Gen Digital (NasdaqGS:GEN) Unveils AI-Driven Browser Norton Neo for Safer, Smarter Web Experience
summary: Gen Digital (NasdaqGS:GEN) experienced a 15% price increase over the past month, potentially influenced by several factors. The company launched Norton Neo, a new AI-powered browser aimed at enhancing user experience and security, aligning with its emphasis on innovation. Furthermore, the quarterly earnings report reflected growth, with sales and net income seeing notable increases compared to the previous year. On a broader market level, tech shares faced headwinds due to renewed trade...
